entry.title: The Merge is a huge milestone, but Protocol researchers are still innovating. 🐠Goldfish by @jneu_net et al. is a provably secure variant of fork-ch...
entry.summary: The Merge is a huge milestone, but Protocol researchers are still innovating. 🐠Goldfish by @jneu_net et al. is a provably secure variant of fork-choice that could lead to an even more secure chain. Learn more 👇 Joachim Neu: The Merge is a monumental achievement But we don’t think PoS Eth will have reached its final form post-merge Introducing Goldfish 🐠, a provably secure variant of fork-choice that could lead to an even more secure chain 💪🧵 w/@fradamt @ErtemTas @dntse https://www.paradigm.xyz/2022/09/goldfish
